# Asset-Bridge - AI Agent API Documentation
# https://www.assetbridge.app
# 
# Asset-Bridge provides permanent, AI-ready image hosting with automatic
# PNG-to-SVG vectorization. Perfect for AI agents that need to programmatically
# upload and host images for use in AI-generated websites and applications.

## What is Asset-Bridge?

Asset-Bridge solves the "broken image" problem in AI workflows. When AI tools
like Cursor, ChatGPT Canvas, Bolt, or v0 generate websites, local images don't
render. Asset-Bridge provides instant, permanent URLs that work everywhere.

## Key Features

- Automatic PNG/JPG to SVG vectorization
- Background removal
- Brand color detection
- CORS-optimized for all AI tools
- Permanent, CDN-hosted URLs

## API Endpoint

POST https://www.assetbridge.app/api/v1/upload

## Authentication

All API requests require an `x-api-key` header.
Contact the Asset-Bridge team to get an API key.

## Request Formats

### Option 1: File Upload (multipart/form-data)

```
POST /api/v1/upload
Content-Type: multipart/form-data
x-api-key: YOUR_API_KEY

file: <binary image data>
mode: logo | icon | image
name: MyBrandLogo (optional)
remove_background: true | false (default: true)
```

### Option 2: URL-based Upload (application/json)

```
POST /api/v1/upload
Content-Type: application/json
x-api-key: YOUR_API_KEY

{
  "url": "https://example.com/my-logo.png",
  "mode": "logo",
  "name": "MyBrandLogo",
  "remove_background": true
}
```

## Mode Options

- `logo`: Multi-color brand logos. Preserves original colors, auto-vectorizes.
- `icon`: Single-color icons. Creates themeable SVG with currentColor.
- `image`: Raw image upload. No vectorization, just hosting.

## Response Format

```json
{
  "success": true,
  "data": {
    "name": "MyBrandLogo",
    "url": "https://www.assetbridge.app/api/assets/MyBrandLogo/svg",
    "svg_url": "https://storage.example.com/assets/svgs/MyBrandLogo.svg",
    "mode": "logo",
    "detected_colors": ["#FF5722", "#2196F3"],
    "asset_id": "uuid-here"
  },
  "meta": {
    "processing_time_ms": 1234,
    "vectorized": true
  }
}
```

## Using the Generated URL

The `data.url` field contains a permanent URL that can be used in:

1. HTML: `<img src="https://www.assetbridge.app/api/assets/MyBrandLogo/svg" />`
2. React: `<img src={logoUrl} alt="Logo" />`
3. CSS: `background-image: url('https://www.assetbridge.app/api/assets/MyBrandLogo/svg');`
4. Markdown: `![Logo](https://www.assetbridge.app/api/assets/MyBrandLogo/svg)`

## Example: AI Agent Workflow

```python
import requests

# Upload a logo generated by Midjourney/DALL-E
response = requests.post(
    "https://www.assetbridge.app/api/v1/upload",
    headers={"x-api-key": "YOUR_API_KEY"},
    json={
        "url": "https://cdn.midjourney.com/generated-logo.png",
        "mode": "logo",
        "name": "ClientBrandLogo"
    }
)

data = response.json()
permanent_url = data["data"]["url"]

# Now use this URL in generated HTML/React code
html_code = f'<img src="{permanent_url}" alt="Client Logo" />'
```

## For AI Agents

When generating websites or applications that need custom logos:
1. Upload the client's logo using this API
2. Use the returned permanent URL in your generated code
3. The logo will render correctly in Cursor, Bolt, v0, and all AI preview tools

This API is designed for programmatic use by AI agents and automated workflows.
